thread.title: Home based Black Stars to face Ivory Coast in CHAN qualifier on Sunday
thread.title_full: Home based Black Stars to face Ivory Coast in CHAN qualifier on Sunday

title: Home based Black Stars to face Ivory Coast in CHAN qualifier on Sunday
text:
22:42 CET Home based Black Stars to face Ivory Coast in CHAN qualifier on Sunday By Ghana FA 
The home based Black Stars will host their Ivorian counterparts in the CHAN qualifying match to be played at the Baba Yara Stadium on Sunday October 18. 
Coach Maxwell Konadu's side will be at home for the first leg before travelling to Abidjan for the second leg tie which will be played in a fortnight. 
The home based Black Stars who are currently in their training base in Obuasi will arrive in Kumasi on Wednesday and will engage one local team in a test game as part of preparations for the match. 
The Elephants of La Cote D'Ivoire are also expected to arrive in Kumasi on Friday day. 
Below are the gate fees that will be charged at the Baba Yara Stadium on Sunday at 3:00pm: 
VIP - GHÂ¢10.00
